properties.name: spring.hystrix.max-request
properties.description: 请求处理的队列最大值，线程和信号量处理最大请求量的数

properties.name: spring.hystrix.strategy
properties.description: 熔断策略，自定义默认使用信号量

properties.name: spring.hystrix.thread-core-size
properties.description: 核心线程池的线程大小，策略为线程时生效

properties.name: spring.hystrix.time-out
properties.description: hystrix 熔断的超时时间，默认 10000，配置值 > feign.connectTimeout + feign.readTimeout
